memberdef.definition: float LibNoise.Noise2D.this[int x, int y, bool isCropped=true]
memberdef.name: this[int x, int y, bool isCropped=true]

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets a value in the noise map by its position.

parameterdescription.para: The position on the x-axis.
The position on the y-axis.
Indicates whether to select the cropped (default) or uncropped noise map data.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets the constant value at the noise maps borders.
Gets or sets the generator module.
Gets the height of the noise map.
Gets the width of the noise map.
Gets a value whether the object is disposed.
Initializes a new instance of Noise2D.
Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by this object.

simplesect.para: True if the object is completely disposed.

briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of Noise2D.

parameterdescription.para: The width and height of the noise map.

briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of Noise2D.

parameterdescription.para: The width and height of the noise map.
The generator module.

briefdescription.para: Initializes a new instance of Noise2D.

parameterdescription.para: The width of the noise map.
The height of the noise map.
The generator module.

briefdescription.para: Gets normalized noise map data with all values in the set of {0..1}.

parameterdescription.para: Indicates whether to select the cropped (default) or uncropped noise map data.
This value crops off data from the right of the noise map data.
This value crops off data from the bottom of the noise map data.

memberdef.argsstring: (bool isCropped=true, int xCrop=0, int yCrop=0, bool isNormalized=false)
memberdef.name: GetData

briefdescription.para: Gets noise map data.

parameterdescription.para: Indicates whether to select the cropped (default) or uncropped noise map data.
This value crops off data from the right of the noise map data.
This value crops off data from the bottom of the noise map data.
Indicates whether to normalize noise map data.

briefdescription.para: Clears the noise map.

parameterdescription.para: The constant value to clear the noise map with.

memberdef.argsstring: (double left, double right, double top, double bottom, bool isSeamless=true)
memberdef.name: GeneratePlanar

briefdescription.para: Generates a non-seamless planar projection of the noise map.

parameterdescription.para: The clip region to the left.
The clip region to the right.
The clip region to the top.
The clip region to the bottom.
Indicates whether the resulting noise map should be seamless.

memberdef.argsstring: (double angleMin, double angleMax, double heightMin, double heightMax)
memberdef.name: GenerateCylindrical

briefdescription.para: Generates a cylindrical projection of the noise map.

parameterdescription.para: The maximum angle of the clip region.
The minimum angle of the clip region.
The minimum height of the clip region.
The maximum height of the clip region.

memberdef.argsstring: (double south, double north, double west, double east)
memberdef.name: GenerateSpherical

briefdescription.para: Generates a spherical projection of the noise map.

parameterdescription.para: The clip region to the south.
The clip region to the north.
The clip region to the west.
The clip region to the east.

briefdescription.para: Creates a grayscale texture map for the current content of the noise map.
Creates a texture map for the current content of the noise map.

parameterdescription.para: The gradient to color the texture map with.

briefdescription.para: Creates a normal map for the current content of the noise map.

parameterdescription.para: The scaling of the normal map values.

briefdescription.para: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by this object.
Generates a planar projection of a point in the noise map.

parameterdescription.para: The position on the x-axis.
The position on the y-axis.

briefdescription.para: Generates a cylindrical projection of a point in the noise map.

parameterdescription.para: The angle of the point.
The height of the point.

briefdescription.para: Generates a spherical projection of a point in the noise map.

parameterdescription.para: The latitude of the point.
The longitude of the point.

briefdescription.para: Provides a two-dimensional noise map.

detaileddescription.para: This covers most of the functionality from LibNoise's noiseutils library, but the method calls might not be the same. See the tutorials project if you're wondering which calls are equivalent.

member.name: this[int x, int y, bool isCropped=true]
